title: Leading primetime TV programming genres viewed in the U.S. 2015
summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Sitcoms or comedy and lowest at Response Soap operas.
The highest Response Sitcoms or comedy has 44.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Soap operas.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Sitcoms or comedy and lowest at Response Soap operas.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Sitcoms or comedy and lowest at Response Soap operas.
The highest Response Sitcoms or comedy has 44.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Soap operas.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 15 number of Responses.
Response Sitcoms or comedy has the highest Share of respondents and Soap operas has the lowest Share of respondents.
Response Movies has the second highest value for Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 44.0.
Share of respondents at Response Sitcoms or comedy is 48.0 , second place is Movies at 43.0, and thirdly is Drama at 42.0.
Response Children's, and Other type not listed have a similar Share of respondents that is 7.0.
The average Share of respondents in all 15 Responses is 22.53.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 338.0.
